clients list = nil
requests list = nil
scheduler_on = False

a) timeslice expires OR
b) lock_held==False (due to relinquish)

div.div:
signal cond variable holder_has_lock_cv
(to notify thread B)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 229px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1038px; margin-left: 1225px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Send DROP_LOCK to lock_holder
2. wait on condition variable holder_has_lock_cv
3. set lock_held=False
4. set lock_holder=NULL

Notify all clients when status changes
(e.g. if ON->OFF
send SCHED_OFF to all clients)
